verbose_text: In addition, resistin directly counters the anti-inflammatory effects of adiponectin on vascular endothelial cells by promoting the expression of the proinflammatory adhesion molecules vascular cell adhesion molecule 1 (vCAm1), intercellular adhesion molecule 1 (ICAm1), and pentraxin 3 in these cells, thereby enhancing leukocyte adhesion [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression of the proinflammatory adhesion molecules vascular cell adhesion molecule 1 (vCAm1), intercellular adhesion molecule 1 (ICAm1), and pentraxin 3
